alert.note: Alert for Marion; Talbot (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 8:09PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marion and southwestern Talbot Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 809 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Marion Estates, or 11 miles north of Buena Vista, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Box Springs, Marion Estates, Oakland and Juniper. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
